msg: added automatic Ant script support for Tomcat 3.3

author: vmassol
msg: By default, uncomment the log4j.jar property has it is needed with the provided ant build script (the script copies the log4j jar in the test war)

msg: modifications for accepting the -Dbuild.sysclasspath=only parameter when starting Ant

author: vmassol
msg: copied the default web.xml file from {tomcat.home}/conf to our conf directory inside Cactus and use this one for the tests

author: vmassol
msg: passed arguments using -D mechanism instead of using a build.properties.tests (it is a better mechanism and needed for GUMP) + added support for Tomcat 3.3
